ygData.subject: Re: New poll for gladiator
ygData.msgSnippet: I decided to put it the question about how many scenarios in a proposed tournament.  Remember the number of scenarios determines the length of the tournament.

I decided to put it the question about how many scenarios in a 
proposed tournament.  Remember the number of scenarios determines the 
length of the tournament.

Also, there are around 35 scenarios built-in to the registered version 
of the game.
